description.value:
Hunting Prayer
Minor Rite

Time: 1 bonus action
Cost: 1 Gnosis
Frequency: Once per long rest

Description

Hunting Prayer is a short invocation spoken before the chase begins. The Garou offers respect to the spirits of predator and prey alike, asking for clarity of trail and fairness of pursuit.

This Rite does not guarantee success. It ensures the hunt is honest.

Effect

When this Rite is performed, it remains dormant until triggered.

Once before the end of your next long rest, when you fail a Wisdom (Survival) check made to track, hunt, or pursue a creature, you may choose to reroll that check and use the new result.

You must accept the new result.

Limitations

This Rite:

  • Can only be used once per long rest
  • Applies only to Wisdom (Survival) checks related to hunting or tracking
  • Cannot be used on attack rolls, damage rolls, or saving throws
  • Must be declared after the failure but before the outcome is finalized
  • You may have only one active Hunting Prayer effect at a time

"May my steps be true, and may your spirit run free."
